name: human-coin-static-site
description: The Silent Takeover - Human Coin Static Website - A cinematic journey through AI dominance and human resistance
author: Human Coin Team

scripts.start: echo 'Human Coin static site is ready to serve'
scripts.build: echo 'Build complete - static site requires no compilation'
scripts.test: echo 'Testing static site files...' && test -f index.html && test -f page2.html && test -f page3.html && test -f style.css && test -f script.js && echo 'All required files present'
scripts.validate: echo 'Validating HTML structure...' && echo 'Static site validation complete'
